## cilium-operator-oci metrics list

List all metrics for the operator

```
cilium-operator-oci metrics list [flags]
```

### Options

```
  -h, --help                   help for list
  -p, --match-pattern string   Show only metrics whose names match matchpattern
  -o, --output string          json| yaml| jsonpath='{}'
```

### SEE ALSO

* [cilium-operator-oci metrics](cilium-operator-oci_metrics.md)	 - Access metric status of the operator
